phrase: A shadow market has developed at the outskirts of the galaxy where Soltrium is wagered. It's all or nothing in the arena where contestants fight for profit and survival.
translation: Μια σκιώδης αγορά έχει αναπτυχθεί στα περίχωρα του γαλαξία όπου στοιχηματίζεται το σολτρίου. είναι όλα ή τίποτα στην αρένα όπου οι διαγωνιζόμενοι παλεύουν για κέρδος και επιβίωση.

phrase: Start with nothing and collect weapons to eliminate the enemy team.
translation: Ξεκινήστε με το τίποτα και συλλέξτε όπλα για να εξαλείψετε την ομάδα του εχθρού.

phrase: All players start with the same randomised loadout.
translation: Όλοι οι παίκτες ξεκινούν με το ίδιο τυχαίο φορτίο.

comment: [Gamemode Info] [Win Requirement] [Control Shift] A team must control and push the zone back into the enemy spawn to win
translation: Ελέγξτε τη ζώνη για να κερδίσετε

phrase: Get two kills with every weapon, then melee to win
translation: Πάρτε δύο δολοφονίες με κάθε όπλο και στη συνέχεια κάντε μάχη για να κερδίσετε

phrase: Hold the most Soltrium to win
translation: Κρατήστε το περισσότερο σολτρίμ για να κερδίσετε

phrase: Weapons and Mods spawn around the map
translation: Όπλα και mods γεννιούνται γύρω από το χάρτη

comment: [Settings Header Title] This is a summary about how the points UI customisation works
translation: Εδώ μπορείτε να προσαρμόσετε τον τρόπο εμφάνισης των πόντων που κερδίζετε στο παιχνίδι. Τα πρωτεύοντα σημεία τοποθετούνται στην κορυφή της στοίβας σημείων και τα δευτερεύοντα σημεία στο κάτω μέρος της στοίβας σημείων.

phrase: The server name will not be displayed on the scoreboard and other player names and levels will be randomised for you.
translation: Το όνομα του διακομιστή δεν θα εμφανίζεται στον πίνακα αποτελεσμάτων και άλλα ονόματα και επίπεδα παικτών θα είναι τυχαία για εσάς.

phrase: Particles are produced when objects are hit or destroyed. Lowering this percentage will increase FPS
translation: Τα σωματίδια παράγονται όταν αντικείμενα χτυπιούνται ή καταστρέφονται. η μείωση αυτού του ποσοστού θα αυξήσει το FPS

phrase: The map is divided into chunks of 32x32x32 blocks. Reducing this will increase FPS
translation: Ο χάρτης χωρίζεται σε κομμάτια μπλοκ 32x32x32. η μείωση αυτού θα αυξήσει το FPS

phrase: The world is illuminated by sun lights, block lights and muzzle flashes from guns. Reducing the maximum amount of lights that can be rendered will increase FPS
translation: Ο κόσμος φωτίζεται από ηλιακά φώτα, φώτα μπλοκ και λάμψεις ρύγχους από όπλα. η μείωση της μέγιστης ποσότητας φώτων που μπορούν να αποδοθούν θα αυξήσει το FPS

phrase: Frames per Second (FPS) is the amount of times the game will update each second. Lowering this value will decrease CPU and GPU usage
translation: Frames per second (FPS) είναι ο αριθμός των φορών που το παιχνίδι θα ενημερώνει κάθε δευτερόλεπτο. Η μείωση αυτής της τιμής θα μειώσει τη χρήση CPU και GPU

phrase: Controls whether Disruptors, C4, Scanners and Canisters cast shadows
translation: Ελέγχει εάν οι διακόπτες, το c4, οι σαρωτές και τα δοχεία δημιουργούν σκιές
Ελέγχει εάν τα σωματίδια δημιουργούν σκιές

phrase: Vertical sync matches the update rate of the game to the refresh rate of your monitor. Enabling this may fix screen tearing
translation: Ο κάθετος συγχρονισμός ταιριάζει με το ρυθμό ενημέρωσης του παιχνιδιού με τον ρυθμό ανανέωσης της οθόνης σας. ενεργοποιώντας αυτό μπορεί να διορθώσει το σχίσιμο της οθόνης

phrase: Increasing this will improve the quality of Ambient Occlusion postprocessing
translation: Αυξάνοντας αυτό θα βελτιωθεί η ποιότητα της μετεπεξεργασίας περιβάλλοντος αποκλεισμού

phrase: Automatically pause the game when you change to another window
translation: Αυτόματη παύση του παιχνιδιού όταν αλλάξετε σε άλλο παράθυρο

phrase: Replace swear words in chat messages with delicious food
translation: Αντικαταστήστε τις βρισιές στα μηνύματα συνομιλίας με νόστιμο φαγητό

[Unit] [Plural] 0 Blocks. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers
[Plural] 0 Seconds. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers
[Plural] 0 Minutes. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers
[Plural] 0 Hours. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers
[Plural] 0 Days. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers
[Plural] 0 Weeks. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers
[Plural] 0 Months. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers
[Plural] 0 Years. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers
[Plural] 0 Waypoints. A waypoint is like a point in a path that consists of multiple segments. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers
[Plural] 0 Slots. A slot here refers to an equipment slot. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers
[Plural] 0 Tags. A tag here refers to a killcam tag. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers
[Plural] 0 Pellets. A pellet here refers to a tiny metal ball propelled by a shotgun blast. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers

[Plural] 0 Deliveries. A delivery here refers to delivering a bomb to a location in the Escort gamemode. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers

[Plural] 0 Assists. This refers to when you deal damage to an enemy, and then a friendly kills the enemy. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers

[Plural] 0 Spot assists. This refers to when you mark the location of an enemy, and then a friendly kills the enemy. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers

[Plural] 0 Scanner assists. This refers to when you place a Scanner that reveals the location of an enemy, and then a friendly kills that enemy. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers
[Plural] 0 Saves. This refers to when you save a friendly from being killed. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers

[Plural] 0 Avenges. This refers to when you kill an enemy that recently killed a friendly, i.e. you 'avenged' your team mate. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers
[Plural] 0 Lights. This refers to the amount of lights that are rendered. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers
[Plural] 0 Chunks. A chunk is a group of 32x32x32 blocks. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers

[Plural] 0 Samples. A sample here refers to a shader sample, where more samples means a higher quality shader image. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers
[Plural] 0 Degrees. The mathematical unit used to measure angles. 0-20 are written out here because different languages have different suffixes for different numbers
